entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 16 March 2023
